atg.portal.servlet
Interface GearServletResponse

All Superinterfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, PortalServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
public interface GearServletResponse
extends PortalServletResponse

The gear response object encapsulates all information destined to a portal
